Room.Name: Castle Kayleigh Stairwell
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a spiral stone stairwell in the old Tower of Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: The witch of Kayleigh and her brother terrorized the countryside around the city of Kista until the powerful Archmage Tellia Aphrotine found them here one night. A five day battle ensued, and the castle was burned. Aphrotine was able to remove the power of flight from both the witch and her brother, and they have been imprisoned here ever since.
